column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The ambiance was fine; not too loud
column2: not too quiet. The hostesses were polite and friendly
column3: the restaurant was clean. Our server kept perfect tabs on us (I was remiss in not getting her name)
column4: and kept our glasses filled and made sure we wanted for nothing. Even the back waiters were attentive
column5: clearing dishes as soon as we were finished and keeping our waters filled.
